GSD.product_version: versions from v4.6 to before v5.10.124
GSD.description:
tty: goldfish: Fix free_irq() on remove

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.124 by commit 65ca4db68b6819244df9024aea4be55edf8af1ef, it was introduced in version v4.6 by commit 465893e18878e119d8d0255439fad8debbd646fd. For more details please see the references link.
